properties.description: This ADF Pipeline, has 3 Steps, 1. DBT processing 2. Extracts the Snowflake Data to Blob Files and 2. Push the Files from Blob to SFTP Location

activities.name: Get_Extract_Metadata
activities.description: This activity pulls the details of the snowflake table and blob location from khc_enggextract_metadata table which needs to extracted.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select orch.parameter_json,engg.* from khc_enggextract_metadata engg 
inner join khc_orchestration_metadata orch 
on engg.dataset_name=orch.dataset_name 
and engg.application_name=orch.application_name
and engg.active_ind='y' and orch.active_ind='y' 
and engg.dataset_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.DatasetGroup}%'
and engg.application_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}'

activities.name: Get_Extract_Metadata_Success
activities.description: This activity logs success of  Get_Extract_Metadata activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: PipelineSucessful_high_radius
activities.description: This Activity logs completion of pipeline in khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: FE_OUTBOUND_FOLDER
activities.description: This activity removes each extract_blob_location folder from outbound folder.

activities.name: Get_Metadata_of_outbound
activities.description: This activity pulls the details of extract_blob_location.

activities.name: IF_outbound_folder_exists
activities.description: This activity checks if extract_blob_location folder exists or not.

ifTrueActivities.name: DL_OUTBOUND_FOLDER
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity deletes the extract_blob_location from outbound folder.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-Success_03_02_01
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs success of DL_OUTBOUND_FOLDER activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-Failure_03_02_01
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs failure of DL_OUTBOUND_FOLDER activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Success_03_01
activities.description: This activity logs success of Get_metadata_of_outbound activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Success_03_02
activities.description: This activity logs success of IF_outbound_folder_exists activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_03_01
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Get_Metadata_of_outbound activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_03_02
activities.description: This activity logs failure of IF_outbound_folder_exists activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: Snowflake_Extraction
activities.description:
This activity executes the Snowflake_Extraction pipeline.
Parameters are passed from the output of enggcontainer_metadata activity.

activities.name: Blob_To_SFTP_Extraction
activities.description:
This pipeline executes the generic_blob_to_sftp push pipeline.
Parameters are passed from pipeline parameters.

activities.name: Snowflake_Extraction_Success
activities.description: This activity logs success of Snowflake_Extraction activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: Blob_To_SFTP_Extraction_Success
activities.description: This activity logs success of Blob_To_SFTP_Extraction activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: Snowflake_Extraction_Failure
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Snowflake_Extraction activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: Blob_To_SFTP_Extraction_Failure
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Blob_To_SFTP_Extraction activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: WB-SendFailureEmail03
activities.description: This activity sends an email to the teams group of high radius when the pipeline fails

body.value:
{         "to_email": "@{variables('emailTo')}",         "subject": "Failed during Blob to Sftp : @{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName} - @{activity('Fetch_Metadata').output.value[0].dataset_group}",         "body": "Dear All,

The cloud analytics data load process failed for the Application: @{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}
Please find below the details:

Pipeline Name: @{pipeline().Pipeline}
Pipeline Run ID: @{pipeline().RunId}
Pipeline Trigger Name: @{pipeline().TriggerName}
Pipeline Trigger Type: @{pipeline().TriggerType}
Pipeline Start Time: @{pipeline().TriggerTime}
Activity: Blob_To_SFTP_Extraction

Parameters:
===========
Application Name: @{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}
Dataset Group: @{pipeline().parameters.DatasetGroup}


Error Code: @{activity('Blob_To_SFTP_Extraction').Error.errorCode}
Error Message: @{activity('Blob_To_SFTP_Extraction').Error.message}

Please take care.

Regards,
Cloud Analytics Team",         "importance": "High" }

activities.name: WB-SendFailureEmail02
activities.description: This activity sends an email to the teams group of high radius when the pipeline fails

body.value:
{         "to_email": "@{variables('emailTo')}",         "subject": "Failed during Snowflake_Extraction : @{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName} - @{activity('Fetch_Metadata').output.value[0].dataset_group}",         "body": "Dear All,

The cloud analytics data load process failed for the Application: @{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}
Please find below the details:

Pipeline Name: @{pipeline().Pipeline}
Pipeline Run ID: @{pipeline().RunId}
Pipeline Trigger Name: @{pipeline().TriggerName}
Pipeline Trigger Type: @{pipeline().TriggerType}
Pipeline Start Time: @{pipeline().TriggerTime}
Activity: Snowflake_Extraction

Parameters:
===========
Application Name: @{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}
Dataset Group: @{pipeline().parameters.DatasetGroup}


Error Code: @{activity('Snowflake_Extraction').Error.errorCode}
Error Message: DBT Processing failed, check the logs under below path:
@{concat('/khc_logs/',pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName,'/',formatDateTime(utcnow(),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'/snowflake_extracts/')}

Please take care.

Regards,
Cloud Analytics Team",         "importance": "High" }

activities.name: Fetch_metadata
activities.description: This activity pulls the details related to orchestration_metadata(parameter_json) process.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from khc_orchestration_metadata 
where application_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}'
and dataset_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.DatasetGroup}%' and  active_ind  ='y'

activities.name: ForEach_row
activities.description: This is to have each dbt execution

activities.name: DBT_Processing
activities.description: This activity will start the DBT processing of the comscore models
